Package tan.jerry.process_future_movement.service.performance

Class ProcessFutureMovementForkJoinTaskletProcessorPerformanceTest

java.lang.Object
tan.jerry.process_future_movement.service.performance.ProcessFutureMovementForkJoinTaskletProcessorPerformanceTest
@SpringBatchTest @SpringBootTest @ActiveProfiles("test") class ProcessFutureMovementForkJoinTaskletProcessorPerformanceTest extends Object
This class contains performance tests for the ProcessFutureMovementForkJoinTaskletProcessor. It measures the processing time for different sizes of input data (original, 10x, 100x, 10Kx). The purpose of these tests is to gauge the performance and scalability of the processor under varying workloads.

    • performanceTest10KSizeLoop

      @Test void performanceTest10KSizeLoop()
      This method performs the 10K size performance test multiple times based on the configuration. It checks the `enable.performance.loop` property to decide whether to execute the loop. If enabled, it reads the `performance.loop.size` property to determine the number of iterations. Each iteration runs the `performanceTest10KSize()` method and logs the results. The method also reports metrics to the Spring Actuator for Prometheus using Micrometer.

    • performanceRecursiveLoopTest

      @Test void performanceRecursiveLoopTest()
      Performance test that runs the 10K test a specified number of times in a loop, using recursion. The number of iterations is determined by the configuration property 'performance.recursive.loop.counter'. This method is controlled by the configuration property 'enable.performance.recursive.loop'. If recursion is enabled, it calls itself recursively for the specified number of iterations. Metrics for each iteration are recorded using Micrometer and logged to the console.

    • performanceRecursiveLoopTestHelper

      private void performanceRecursiveLoopTestHelper(int loopCounter)
      Helper method for the recursive performance test. This method handles the actual recursion.
      Parameters:
      loopCounter - The current value of the loop counter. The method stops recursion when the counter reaches zero.

      private Map<String,Double> loadData(String filename)
